DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis: In giant cell arteritis (GCA), a short initial treatment with anti-TNF may allow a faster decrease of steroids dosage and therefore avoid some of the adverse events of steroids.
DOC.brief_title: HECTHOR: Humira to Spare Steroids in Giant Cell Arteritis
DOC.detailed_description: The protocol consists of a SC injection of adalimumab or placebo every 2 weeks for 10 weeks added to steroids
